blogPost.excerpt: FilterPixel is an AI desktop application that helps photographers to select photos faster. Get rid of your tedious, tiring & time-consuming photo selection process so that you can spend more time doing what you love.
blogPost.body: FilterPixel is an AI desktop application that helps photographers to select photos faster. Get rid of your tedious, tiring & time-consuming photo selection process so that you can spend more time doing what you love.
blogPost.title: FilterPixel - AI based photo selection for photographers
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: FilterPixel是一款人工智能桌面应用程序，可以帮助摄影师更快地选择照片。摆脱乏味、疲惫和耗时的照片选择过程，这样你就可以花更多的时间做你喜欢的事情。
localize.tagline: 基于人工智能的摄影师照片选择

localize.description: FilterPixel是一款人工智能桌面應用程序，可以幫助攝影師更快地選擇照片。擺脫乏味、疲憊和耗時的照片選擇過程，這樣你就可以花更多的時間做你喜歡的事情。
localize.tagline: 基於人工智能的攝影師照片選擇
